statements: SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT name, age FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 25;
SELECT name, location FROM user_profiles WHERE location LIKE 'New%';
SELECT user_id, name, age, location FROM user_profiles ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT name, age FROM user_profiles WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT name, age FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE location IS NOT NULL AND age < 40 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT user_id, name, location FROM user_profiles WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE location LIKE '%York%' AND age >= 18;
SELECT COUNT(user_id) AS user_count, AVG(age) AS avg_age FROM user_profiles;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT name, age FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, name, location FROM user_profiles ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT name, age, location FROM user_profiles WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT user_id, friend_id FROM user_friends;
SELECT user_id, name, age, location FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT user_id, name, age, location FROM user_profiles WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT user_id, name, age, location FROM user_profiles WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 40 ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, name, age, location FROM user_profiles WHERE age < 30 AND location LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY location ASC, age DESC;
SELECT u.user_id, u.name, u.age, u.location, f.friend_id FROM user_profiles u JOIN user_friends f ON u.user_id = f.user_id WHERE f.friend_id = 12345 ORDER BY u.name ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 25
SELECT name, age FROM users ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT post_content FROM posts WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT name, location FROM users WHERE age < 30 AND location = 'New York'
SELECT comment_text FROM comments WHERE comment_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT name, age, location FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC, age DESC
SELECT post_id, post_content, posted_at FROM posts ORDER BY posted_at DESC
SELECT user_id, comment_text, comment_date FROM comments WHERE user_id = 1 AND comment_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY comment_date ASC

SELECT users.name, posts.post_content, comments.comment_text FROM users JOIN posts ON users.user_id = posts.user_id JOIN comments ON posts.post_id = comments.post_id WHERE users.age < 40 ORDER BY users.name ASC
SELECT DISTINCT name AS user_name, age, location FROM users WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, name, age FROM users WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT user_id, name, location FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT post_id, post_content, post_date FROM posts ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT user_id_1, user_id_2, relationship_type FROM friends WHERE relationship_type = 'close';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY age DESC, name ASC;
SELECT user_id, name, location FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT p.post_id, p.post_content, p.post_date, u.name FROM posts p JOIN users u ON p.user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.age <= 25 ORDER BY p.post_date DESC;
SELECT u.name, p.photo_url FROM users u JOIN photos p ON u.user_id = p.user_id WHERE p.upload_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY u.name;

SELECT f.user_id_1, f.user_id_2, u1.name AS user1_name, u2.name AS user2_name FROM friends f JOIN users u1 ON f.user_id_1 = u1.user_id JOIN users u2 ON f.user_id_2 = u2.user_id WHERE f.relationship_type = 'close friends';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT name, age FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT post_id, content FROM posts WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, comment_text FROM comments WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT like_id, created_at FROM likes ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT name, age FROM users WHERE age > 30
SELECT * FROM posts WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_likes FROM likes GROUP BY user_id
SELECT u.name, p.content, c.comment_text FROM users u JOIN posts p ON u.id = p.user_id JOIN comments c ON p.post_id = c.post_id
SELECT u.name AS user_name, f.follower_user_id AS follower_id FROM users u JOIN followers f ON u.id = f.user_id ORDER BY u.id ASC
